title: Macramé Basics: Your First Wall Hanging – BIG CORD

items.label: Macramé Basics: Your First Wall Hanging

tutorial_detail_data.title: Macramé Basics: Your First Wall Hanging
tutorial_detail_data.body_html:
What you'll need

  • BIG CORD 5mm Cotton Core – 30 meters
  • Wooden dowel or driftwood – approx. 40 cm
  • Scissors

Follow the steps in the tutorial to create your first wall hanging.
